description: F-LNG1 Zipf law at n=373 (S327) — alpha stall detected at 0.788 vs projected decline
hypothesis: Lesson citations follow power law with α ≈ 1.0 (Zipf), confirming ISO-8 isomorphism
interpretation: Lesson citation distribution is approximately Zipfian (α=0.788, R²=0.838). ISO-8 isomorphism PARTIALLY confirmed. α deviates from 1.0 — flatter (more even distribution) than canonical Zipf.
stall_note: Alpha has not declined from S313 (0.7867) to S327 (0.7875) — flat over 13 new lessons. Rate near zero. Projected tail-flat still n~414 but may be stabilizing near 0.78.
rate_note: Rate dropped from -0.001583/L (S190-S313) to ~0 (S313-S327). Stall detected.
projected_tail_flat_note: Projection suspended — alpha stall suggests possible attractor near 0.79
stall_interpretation: New lessons may be reaching equilibrium citation rate
ISO-8: mature citation distribution = stable Zipf regime
Compare: natural languages stabilize alpha; swarm may do same
